Request A Quote Products Avigilon Security Two Way Radios Portable Mobile Base Marine Electronics Radar GPS Fishfinder About Puget Sound Instrument Puget Sound Instrument (PSICOMPANY) is a leading worldwide provider for two-way radio, situational awareness monitoring software and commercial marine products. Founded in 1965, the company enjoys a seasoned staff of sales and technical experts, with an average tenure of over 10 years that provide highly accurate proposals and best in class technical service. Operating with the highest integrity is why school districts, police departments, cities, military, healthcare, commercial and other business customers depend on us to deliver critical 24/7 communication, situational awareness monitoring and commercial navigation systems. About Us Rebates Copyright © 2013 - 2024
